title: Council Decision of 11 October 1993 appointing a full member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 11 October 1993 appointing a full member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
(93/C 284/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 85/385/EEC of 10 June 1985, setting up an Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its decision of 15 February 1993 (2), the Council appointed Mr Jaime REYNOLDS a full member of the said Committee for the period ending 19 June 1994;
Whereas the United Kingdom Government has nominated Mr Robert LOWENSTEIN to replace Mr Jaime REYNOLDS,
main_body: Mr Robert LOWENSTEIN is hereby appointed a full member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of architecture in place of Mr Jaime REYNOLDS for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 19 June 1994.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 11 October 1993.
For the Council
The President
J.-M. DEHOUSSE
(1) OJ No L 223, 21. 8. 1985, p. 26.
(2) OJ No C 52, 23. 2. 1993, p. 1.
